stories.text: Today I searched for an email address of a spam suspect. Google returned nada, nuthin. All pther search engines had this spammer on recprd and returned many search results both related and unrelated. How in the world can Google still be 85% of the search market is beyond me? Google schmoogle is no longer guest on my PC.
stories.title: Google now is the most sucky SE outthere

stories.text:
I am German and looking to move with my family to maybe Corfu or Crete! I know that the mainland is becoming more attractive (Athens in particular), but how is the experience on the islands?

- Internet speed

- Job safety (do you find enough remote jobs?)

- Developer communities

- Access to hardware in case something brakes

Would appreciate some insights!
stories.title: Ask HN: How is the experience being a SE living on a Greek island?

stories.text:
I guess I am a pessimist.

I don't see alternative energy succeeding.

I see social and institutional values continuing to degrade.

I don't see further technological innovation comparable to the period from 1790 to 1990.

An aging society in a degraded world with bankrupt social values can not persist indefinitely based on ponzi schemes and other more sophisticated financial shell games.

Bottom line, energy, physics, resources matter.

Why life is here on planet earth matters.

When biological life becomes cut of from its roots in a natural ecosystem it is only a matter of time before decay sets in.

Without running a fitness race life becomes degraded and aimless.

The future holds societal collapse.

Not necessarily due to a buzz word cause (for example climate change) but because of technology itself and its influence on the psyche of man.
stories.title: What do you think the future holds for the World?
